Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer

Provides a framework for viewers, which are model-based content adapters for widgets.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AsyncContentCallback<E> Asynchronous ContentProvider data callback.
BaseLabelProvider<T> Tag interface for objects that can return labels for model objects.
BaseTreeViewer Defines common methods for tree based viewers.
Checkable<E> Interface for objects that support elements with a checked state.
CheckStateListener A listener which is notified of changes to the checked state of items in checkbox viewers.
ContentProvider<I> A content provider mediates between the viewer's model and the viewer itself.
ElementComparer<E> This interface is used to compare elements in a viewer for equality.
Selection<E> A selection containing elements.
SelectionChangedListener A listener which is notified when a viewer's selection changes.
SelectionProvider<E> Interface common to all objects that provide a selection.
StructuredContentProvider<I,E> An interface to content providers for structured viewers.
TreeContentProvider An interface to content providers for tree-structure-oriented viewers.
 

Class Summary
CellLabelProvider<E> The CellLabelProvider is an implementation of a label provider for structured viewers.
CheckStateChangedEvent Event object describing a change to the checked state of a viewer element.
DataListViewer A concrete viewer based for a List.
DefaultContentProvider A basic IStructuredContentProvider that supports arrays and lists.
DefaultElemmentComparer<E> Default implementation of the ElementComparer interface
DefaultSelection<E> A concrete implementation of the Selection interface, suitable for instantiating.
LabelProvider<T> Provides the text and/or icon style for the label of a given element.
ModelCellLabelProvider A CellLabelProvider for Model instances.
ModelComparator A Comparator for Model instances.
ModelContentProvider A ContentProvider implementation for Models.
ModelLabelProvider A LabelProvider implementation for Model instances.
ModelTreeContentProvider A TreeContentProvider implementation for Model instances.
RemoteContentProvider<I,E> A IStructuredContentProvider implementation that supports the remote loading of data and paging.
RemoteModelContentProvider A RemoteContentProvider for model instances.
SelectionChangedEvent Event object describing a selection change.
SelectionService Provides a selection service where SelectionProviders can register, allowing any listeners to be notifed of selection events.
SourceSelectionChangedListener  
StructuredViewer The ColumnViewer is the abstract superclass of viewers that have columns.
TableViewer<T extends TableItem> A concrete viewer based on a Table widget.
TableViewerColumn ViewerColumn implementation for TableViewer to enable column-specific label providers.
TreeTableViewer An interface to content providers for treetable-structure-oriented viewers.
TreeTableViewerColumn ViewerColumn implementation for TreeTableViewer to enable column-specific label providers.
TreeViewer An interface to content providers for tree-structure-oriented viewers.
Viewer<CP> A Viewer is a model-based adapter for a Widget.
ViewerCell<E> The ViewerCell is the representation of a cell.
ViewerColumn Instances of this class represent a column of a ColumnViewer.
ViewerFilter<P,E> A viewer filter is used by a viewer to extract a subset of elements provided by its content provider.
ViewerFilterField<P,E> A specialized text field that filters a viewer's input.
ViewerSorter<T> A viewer sorter is used by a Viewer to reorder the elements provided by its content provider.
 

Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer Description

Provides a framework for viewers, which are model-based content adapters for widgets. This viewer implementation is based on JFace API from the Eclipse Project.
